category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_DEFERRED_SHOW_TIMEOUT
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the timer button is displayed or not.After you change this preference's value, you must log off and then log on for it to take effect. Valid Values: True - Displays the timer button. false - Hides the timer button.
